text: What is the status of Cxx now? 1.6 manual says: "For direct C++ interfacing, see the <https://github.com/Keno/Cxx.jl|Cxx> package.", the Cxx package says: "*Please, note that Cxx.jl only works (out of the box) currently with Julia 1.1.x to 1.3.x, i.e. with no currently supported Julia"*

elements.text: What is the status of Cxx now? 1.6 manual says: "For direct C++ interfacing, see the
Please, note that Cxx.jl only works (out of the box) currently with Julia 1.1.x to 1.3.x, i.e. with no currently supported Julia"

text: Support for C++ is just starting to be added to <https://github.com/analytech-solutions/CBinding.jl|CBinding.jl> so an alternative to Cxx.jl is still a ways out for comprehensive C++ support.  More trivial C++ support could be available sooner though.
